articles.content: Meanwhile, Deepika has been entertaining her fans with the various episodes of the Season 1 of her Productivity in the time of Corona. The activities include enjoying juices, making desserts, taking care of her skin, and trolling Ranveer.

articles.description: Ramanand Sagar's Ramayan will now air on Star Plus, while BR Chopra's Mahabharat will be telecast on Colors from May 4.
